   19: %%
   20: -module(edlin_context_SUITE).
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   23: 
   24: -export([get_context/1]).
   25: 
   26: suite() ->
   27:     [{timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   28: all() ->
   29:     [get_context].
   30: groups() ->
   31:     [].
   32: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   33:     Config.
   34: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   35:     ok.
   36: 
   37: get_context(_Config) ->
   38:     {term, [], {atom, "h"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("h")),
   39:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("h(file")),
   40:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("h(file,open")),
   41:     {term, [{call, "h(file,open)"}], {atom, "h"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("h(file,open), h")),
   42:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("h(file,open), h(file")),
   43:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("h(file,open), h(file,open")),
   44:     {term, [{call, "h(file,open)"}], {call, "h(file,open)"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("h(file,open), h(file,open)")),
   45:     {function} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:")),
   46:     {function} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open")),
   47:     {function, "file", "open", [], [], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(")),
   48:     {string} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"")),
   49:     {string} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"/")),
   50:     {string} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"Word")),
   51:     {function, "file", "open", [], {string, "\"\""}, []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\"")),
   52:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",")),
   53:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{list, [], []}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",[")),
   54:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{tuple, [], []}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",{")),
   55:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{list, [], []},{tuple, [], []}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",[{")),
   56:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{list, [], {atom, "atom"}}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",[atom")),
   57:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{tuple, [], {atom, "atom"}}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",{atom")),
   58:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{list, [], []},{tuple, [], {atom, "atom"}}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",[{atom")),
   59:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{list, [], []},{tuple, [{atom, "atom"}], []}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",[{atom,")),
   60:     {function, "file", "open", [{string, "\"\""}], [], [{map, ["atom"], "atom", [], []}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("file:open(\"\",#{ atom =>")),
   61:     {term, [], {atom, "list"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{list")),
   62:     {term, [], {atom, "list"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{list")),
   63:     {term, [], {atom, "list"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("[list")),
   64:     {map, "M", []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("M#{")),
   65:     {map, "M", []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("M#{key")),
   66:     {map, "M", ["key"]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("M#{key=>")),
   67:     {map, "M", ["key"]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("M#{key:=")), %% map value
   68:     {map, "M", ["key"]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("M#{key=>0")),
   69:     {map, "M", ["key"]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("M#{key=>0,")),
   70:     {map, "M", ["key", "key2"]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("M#{key=>0,key2=>")),
   71:     {map_or_record} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#")),
   72:     {record, "record", [], [], [], [], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record{")),
   73:     {record, "record", [], [], [], [], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record.")),
   74:     {record, "record", [], [], [], {atom, "field"}, []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record{field")),
   75:     {record, "record", ["field"], "field", [], [], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record{field=>")),
   76:     {record, "record", ["field"], "field", [], [], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record{field:=")), %% record_field value
   77:     {record, "record", ["field"], [], [{integer, "0"}], [], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("R#record{field=>0,")),
   78:     {record, "record", ["field", "field2"], "field2", [{integer,"0"}], [], [{list, [], []},{tuple, [{atom, "atom"}], []}]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("R#record{field=>0,field2=>[{atom,")),
   79:     {term,[],{atom,"fun"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun")),
   80:     {term,[],{atom,"fun"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun ")),
   81:     {fun_} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun m")),
   82:     {fun_, "m"} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun m:")),
   83:     {fun_, "m"} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun m:f")),
   84:     {fun_, "m", "f"} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun m:f/")),
   85:     {fun_, "m", "f"} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun m:f/1")), 
   86:     {fun_, "m", "f"} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun m:f/1 ")), 
   87:     {term,[{fun_,"fun m:f/1"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun m:f/1 ,")), 
   88:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
   89:         [{keyword,"receive X -> X end"}],
   90:         [],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(receive X -> X end, ")),
   91:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
   92:         [{keyword,"maybe X -> X end"}],
   93:         [],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(maybe X -> X end, ")),
   94:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
   95:         [{keyword,"try a end"}],
   96:         [],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(try a end, ")),
   97:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
   98:         [{keyword,"catch X -> X end"}],
   99:         [],[]}= edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(catch X -> X end, ")),
  100:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
  101:         [{keyword,"try a catch _:_ -> b end"}],
  102:         [],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(try a catch _:_ -> b end, ")),
  103:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
  104:         [{keyword,"begin X end"}],
  105:         [],[]}= edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(begin X end, ")),
  106:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
  107:         [{keyword,"if X -> X end"}],
  108:         [],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(if X -> X end, ")),
  109:     {function,"user_defined","my_fun",
  110:         [{keyword,"case X of _ -> X end"}],
  111:         [],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("my_fun(case X of _ -> X end, ")),
  112:     {binding} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun() -> X")),
  113:     {term,[],{atom,"x"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun() -> x")),
  114:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun() ->")),
  115:     {macro} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("?")), %% not supported in edlin_expand
  116:     % unknown map
  117:     {term,[{operation,"one = a"},{operation,"two = b"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{ one = a, two = b, ")),
  118:     {term,[{atom,"a"},{atom,"b"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{ one := a, two := b, ")),
  119:     {term,[{atom,"a"},{atom,"b"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{ one => a, two => b, ")),
  120:     {term,[{operation,"A = a"},{operation,"B = b"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("A = a, B = b, ")),
  121:     {term,[{operation,"one = a"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{ one = a, two = ")),
  122:     {term,[{atom,"a"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{ one := a, two := ")),
  123:     {term,[{atom,"a"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{ one => a, two => ")),
  124:     {term,[{operation,"A = a"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("A = a, B = ")),
  125:     {term,[],{operation,"A = a"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("A = a")),
  126:     {'end'} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("a.")),
  127:     {record,"record",[],[],[],[],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record.")),
  128:     {record,"record",[],[],[],[],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{#record.")),
  129:     {record,"record",[],[],[],{atom,"a"},[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record.a")),
  130:     {record,"record",[],[],[],{atom,"a"},[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{#record.a")),
  131:     {term,[],{record,"#record{}"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#record{}")),
  132:     {term,[],{map,"#{ a => b}"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#{ a => b}")),
  133:     {term,[{atom,"a"}],{atom,"tuple"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{a, tuple")),
  134:     {term,[],{tuple,"{a, tuple}"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{a, tuple}")),
  135:     {term,[],{call,"lists:my_fun()"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("lists:my_fun()")),
  136:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("(")),
  137:     {term,[],{parenthesis,"()"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("()")),
  138:     {new_fun,"()"} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun()")),
  139:     %% 256 $]
  140:     {term,[],{list,"[]"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("[]")),
  141:     {term,[{atom,"a"}],{atom,"b"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun() when a, b")),
  142:     {term,[{atom,"a"}],{atom,"b"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun() -> a, b")),
  143:     {term,[{atom,"a"},{atom,"b"}],[]} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun() -> a, b, ")),
  144:     {term, [], {pid, "<1.0.1>"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("<1.0.1>")),
  145:     {term, [], {funref, "#Fun<erl_eval.0.1>"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#Fun<erl_eval.0.1>")),
  146:     {term, [], {ref, "#Ref<1.0.1>"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#Ref<1.0.1>")),
  147:     %{term, [], {port, "#Port<1.0>"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("#Port<1.0>")),
  148:     {term, [], {binary, "<<0>>"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("<<0>>")),
  149:     {term,[],{keyword,"fun (X) -> X end"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun (X) -> X end")),
  150:     {term,[],{keyword,"fun(X) -> X end"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("fun(X) -> X end")), %% should be fun_ too
  151:     {term,[],{keyword,"receive X -> X end"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("receive X -> X end")),
  152:     {error, _} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("no_keyword -> X end")),
  153:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("@")), %% No valid argument 305
  154:     {term,[],{char,"$@"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("$@")),
  155:     {term,[],{char,"$ "}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("$ ")),
  156:     {term,[],{float,"1.0"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1.0")),
  157:     {term,[],{integer,"10#10"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("10#10")),
  158:     {term,[],{integer,"1"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1")),
  159:     {binding} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{X")),
  160:     {term,[{var, "X"}], []} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{X, ")),
  161:     {error,_} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("<abc)")),
  162:     {error,_} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("<abc]")),
  163:     {error,_} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("<abc}")),
  164:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("(abc>")),
  165:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("\"\\\"\"")), %% odd quotes "\""
  166:     {error, _} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("{\"\", $\"}")), %% odd quotes
  167:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("receive X -> ")),
  168:     %% read operator and argument order validity
  169:     {error,_} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("foo bar")), %% TODO what should be returned here, illegal
  170:     {term,[],{operation,"\" \" \" \""}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("\" \" \" \"")), %% " " " "
  171:     {term,[],{operation,"1 + 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1+2")),
  172:     {term,[],{operation,"1 andalso 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 andalso 2")),
  173:     {term,[],{operation,"1 and 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 and 2")),
  174:     {term,[],{operation,"1 orelse 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 orelse 2")),
  175:     {term,[],{operation,"1 or 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 or 2")),
  176:     {term,[],{operation,"1 or 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 or 2")),
  177:     {term,[],{operation,"1 =/= 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 =/= 2")),
  178:     {term,[],{operation,"1 =:= 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 =:= 2")),
  179:     {term,[],{operation,"1 <=> 2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 <=> 2")),
  180:     {term,[],{operation,"<<1>> > <<2>>"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("<<1>>><<2>>")),
  181:     %{term,[],{operation,"<<1>> > <<2>>"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("<<1>> > <<2>>")),
  182:     {error,_} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 + + 2")),
  183:     {term,[],{integer,"2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("1 -> 2")),
  184:     {term,[],{integer,"2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("receive X -> 2")),
  185:     {term} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("receive X ->")),
  186:     {term,[{integer,"2"}],{operation,"1 + 3"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("receive X -> 2, 1+3")),
  187:     {term,[],{integer,"-1"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("-1")),
  188:     {term,[],{float,"-1.2"}} = edlin_context:get_context(lists:reverse("-1.2")),
  189:     ok.
